chunk-1f1fbc3421d8d9e01a59b98a5edbbd7e.description: He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named, also known as Voldemort, is a dark wizard whose wand has a connection to Harry's wand.
Paddington station is the train station where Hagrid and Harry have a meal before Harry's train ride, also referred to as Paddington.

chunk-099669d02932bf8ad3f3c0320aa597b0.description: Scabbers, also known as 'Rat', is Ron's pet rat that bites Goyle, causing Malfoy and his friends to leave. It is feared by Malfoy and his friends, who think there might be more rats lurking among the sweets.
Hermione Granger, also known as 'Hermione', is a student who enters the scene after the confrontation, inquiring about the situation and later joins Harry and Ron on the boat to Hogwarts.

chunk-e3a21dc9b138543e69c2382e20b3663b.description: Hogwarts School is the institution where the Sorting Ceremony occurs and where students are sorted into Houses. It is also known as Hogwarts, the school of witchcraft and wizardry.
